001package com.github.sormuras.bach.command;
002
003import java.io.File;
004import java.util.ArrayList;
005import java.util.Collection;
006import java.util.List;
007import java.util.stream.Collectors;
008
009/** An option collecting module source path segments in module-pattern form. */
010public record ModuleSourcePathPatternsOption(List<String> values) implements Option.Values<String> {
011  public static ModuleSourcePathPatternsOption empty() {
012    return new ModuleSourcePathPatternsOption(List.of());
013  }
014
015  public static ModuleSourcePathPatternsOption of(Collection<String> patterns) {
016    return new ModuleSourcePathPatternsOption(List.copyOf(patterns));
017  }
018
019  public String join() {
020    return values.stream()
021        .map(segment -> segment.replace('/', File.separatorChar))
022        .map(segment -> segment.replace('\\', File.separatorChar))
023        .collect(Collectors.joining(File.pathSeparator));
024  }
025
026  public ModuleSourcePathPatternsOption add(String segment) {
027    var values = new ArrayList<>(this.values);
028    values.add(segment);
029    return new ModuleSourcePathPatternsOption(List.copyOf(values));
030  }
031}
